originalText.text: The bedside manner here is top tier I will say. The staff is super kind, helpful and understanding. I came here with my mother for her surgery and I was notified in every step in her surgery from entry to recovery. I never felt so much at ease. Thank you to everyone here.

text.text: The bedside manner here is top tier I will say. The staff is super kind, helpful and understanding. I came here with my mother for her surgery and I was notified in every step in her surgery from entry to recovery. I never felt so much at ease. Thank you to everyone here.

originalText.text: It's been 2 weeks since my surgery. It's been about 8 years since I've helped build this place. Local 580. I would have never imagined being a patient here, but life is full of surprises! The staff is amazing! Hard working, attentive, and friendly. I was an overnight patient, and I witnessed them work hard and some pulled double shifts. Simple Commitment tells you a lot. They should be getting a yearly bonus for all their hard work. Give them $10 for every hour they work throughout the year, and I believe it would be a great thank you for the extraordinary work they do. If you ever need quality help, this is the place you want to be. God bless you all.

originalText.text: They wouldn't let me see my friend even though I took a bus! How dare you let me ride an NYC bus for no reason. Anyway, enjoy these memes.

originalText.text: The Memorial Sloan Kettering (MSK) Josie Robinson Surgery Center is a relatively new facility that is absolutely beautiful. Upon my arrival, a doorman greeted my accompanying daughters and me and escorted us to the beautiful registration area where my daughters would wait for me while I was in surgery. A kind woman took us to the room where I changed and then was prepped for surgery. I had two excellent nurses before surgery and one excellent nurse post-op. The OR Techs, nurses, and doctors were very professional. My post-op room was private, with a great view of the East River and the tram to Roosevelt Island. The care at this facility was excellent!
